column4: hi i have extreme io problems with my ubuntu desktop. whenever i do an svn *something* it takes like ages and while one cpu is complete idle the other has 100% iowait
can somebody give me hints how to debug that?
did you load iostat or was that default installed
i installed the sysstat package in order to get iostat
don't know i'll have to look it up, will take a sec
only running svn update on one branch (max 50mib in size)
http://paste.ubuntu.com/596414/ <-- apache is the svn backend
